description:
Seabook`s and Rees` father, who abandoned his career as a metals researcher rather than see his work used for military purposes, and now supports his children as a construction worker at Frontier IV`s spaceport. When the colony is attacked by the Crossbone Vanguard, Leslie helps Seabook and friends escape in a space boat, but he himself is left behind at Frontier IV.
Source: Official Site
name: Leslie Arno
